dc_title_s: Access and Support to Education and Training Survey, 2008 [Canada]
dc_description_s: The ASETS brings together three previously-conducted surveys that addressed issues relating to antecedents and determinants to access to postsecondary education, the role of student loans and savings in the financing of postsecondary education and participation in adult education and training. The ASETS replaces the Survey of Approaches to Educational Planning (SAEP), the Post-secondary Education Participation Survey (PEPS) and the Adult Education and Training Survey (AETS), which were last conducted in 2002 and 2003. Bringing together the three surveys realizes economies of scale in the management, development, implementation and dissemination of the survey.
dc_creator_sm: Tourism and the Centre for Education Statistics Division
